sky_ad:
CREATE TABLE `sky_ad` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tag_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `info` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '简介',
  `link1` varchar(400) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接1',
  `link2` varchar(400) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接2',
  `starttime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开始时间',
  `endtime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片地址',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `price` decimal(9,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0',
  `object_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `tag_id_2nd` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `checkbox_attr` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `imgurl2` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `tag_id` (`tag_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_ad_tags:
CREATE TABLE `sky_ad_tags` (
  `tag_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `m` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'index',
  `a` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default',
  `width` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `height` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `tagno` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`tag_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=21 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_admin:
CREATE TABLE `sky_admin` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `username` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `password` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `salt` smallint(6) NOT NULL,
  `group_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `isfounder` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_admin_group:
CREATE TABLE `sky_admin_group` (
  `id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `orderindex` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_article:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `catid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `love_num` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `fav_num` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `forward_num` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `keywords` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `comment_num` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `model_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `isimg` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `is_temp` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_img` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `thumbsinfo` text NOT NULL,
  `last_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `grade` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_recommend` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `view_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `user_catid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shop_cid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `isnew` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `ishot` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_cat_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_1` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_2` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_3` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_4` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `catid` (`catid`) ,
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6861 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_article_attr:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article_attr` (
  `product_attr_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `attr_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `attr_content` mediumtext NOT NULL,
  `attr_cat_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_price` mediumtext NOT NULL,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_total_num` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `attr_buy_num` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`product_attr_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_article_data:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article_data` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `content` mediumtext NOT NULL,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_attribute:
CREATE TABLE `sky_attribute` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(40) NOT NULL,
  `cat_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `type_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `attr_type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `col_name` char(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text,
  `input_type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `ishtml` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `cat_id` (`cat_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_attribute_cat:
CREATE TABLE `sky_attribute_cat` (
  `cat_id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(60) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `attr_group` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`cat_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_brand:
CREATE TABLE `sky_brand` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `logo` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `isindex` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `orderindex` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '999',
  `catid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text,
  `description` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `shopid` (`shopid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_category:
CREATE TABLE `sky_category` (
  `catid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `model_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `tablename` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '表名',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `cname` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `orderindex` smallint(6) NOT NULL,
  `type_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `cat_tpl` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `list_tpl` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `show_tpl` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `keywords` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `level` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `topic_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `comment_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `last_post` text NOT NULL,
  `logo` varchar(225) DEFAULT '/static/images/category_logo.jpg',
  `attr_cat_id` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`catid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=20 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_checkin:
CREATE TABLE `sky_checkin` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `day` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

  `type_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `ip` varchar(32) NOT NULL,

  KEY `t_u_day` (`type_id`,`userid`,`day`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_collect:
CREATE TABLE `sky_collect` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `isvalid` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `ruledata` mediumtext,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `rule_id` (`rule_id`) ,
  KEY `url` (`url`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_collect_config:

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

sky_collect_rule:

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL,

sky_collect_type:
CREATE TABLE `sky_collect_type` (
  `type_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

sky_comment:
CREATE TABLE `sky_comment` (

  `ip_city` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_config:

  `phone_pwd` varchar(100) NOT NULL,

  `smtphost` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `smtpport` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

sky_cron:

  `minute` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',

  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL,

) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_dataapi:

sky_dbcache:

sky_district:

sky_express_fee:

sky_express_fee_city:
